page.title: 10Alcester Grammer School.
page.content: Secondary education in most areas is run on the Comprehensive System, but in Alcester this runs side by side with the Grammer School.To gain access to this school children have to sit an examination called the 11+. The founder of Alcester Grammer School was Walter Newport.He was a Northampton gentleman. The school badge has a picture of a Roman Soldier holding a standard.The badge is taken from a Roman coin found in Alcester.The school motto is also added to the badge.{CHRISTUS NOBISCUM {STATE}! is the school motto and it is Latin for Christ be with us stand firm!. There are about four hundred and fifty members of Alcester Grammer School.The boys and girls have a varied curriculam.
